messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are a film director looking for producers to invest. You can talk to either of your two friends, Nora and Philip. Nora is married to Peter who is friends with Shikha. Shikha knows Gal who can introduce to Alex. Alex can introduce you to David, who can invest $1M in your movie. But you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. Philip is friends with Yakub who can introduce you to Ajay. Ajay is friends with Joe who is married to Rachel. Rachel's brother Harry has $5M budget for producing a movie. But you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

Answer: $1M
Your first friend is Philip, so you can ask him. He will tell you that if you take one of your paths Nora will meet with Shikha. When they meet they can find someone for your movie, and they will tell a third person who will talk to her husband about what she has found. That third person is Gal, who can introduce you to Alex. Alex is a friend of David and can introduce you to David. When David hears of your movie, he will invest $1M.
Philip's path leads you to the most money, for the least amount of steps.
You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You receive a task, think step by step and provide your final outcome at the end.
Your task is to find out the closest city between A and B. You will receive a latitude and a longitude, for example (B, 27.75, 53.28), and an initial location (A, 27.75, 53.05), and an amount of distance you are away from B.
You first need to find the distance between A and B. The solution is 1857995.555715594598299999999999993474266666476406827419951
Once you have the distance, you need to figure out where B is. You can use the Great circle calculator to figure out the lat longs of B.
http://www.greatcircle.com/distance_finder/latitude-and-longitude.php
Once you know the lat, longs you simply calculate the distance again to see how far you are.
Find out the location of B.
user: Find out the distance from city A to city B
Answer: 1857995.555715594598299999999999993474266666476406827419951 meters
Your task is to find out the closest city between A and B. You will receive a latitude and a longitude, for example, and an initial location.
